def get_users_ids(string):
    return [w.replace("uid", "", 1).strip() for w in string.lower().replace("#", "").split(",")]

def get_users_ids(string):
    return [uid.replace("uid", "", 1).strip() for uid in string.replace("#", "").lower().split(", ")]

import re

def get_users_ids(s):
    s = s.lower().replace('#', '')
    return [re.sub(r'^uid', '', x.strip(), count=1).strip() for x in s.split(',')]

def get_users_ids(s):
    return [x.strip()[3:].strip() for x in s.replace('#','').lower().split(',')]
get_users_ids = lambda string: [x.strip()[3:].strip() for x in string.lower().replace('#','').split(', ')]

def get_users_ids(string):
    return [word.strip()[3:].strip() for word in string.replace("#","").lower().split(", ")]

def get_users_ids(s):
    s=s.replace('#', '').lower()
    r = [e.rstrip().strip() for e in s.split(', ')]
    r = [e[3:].strip() if e[:3]=='uid' else e for e in r]
    return r
